summary: TAKATA RECALL    THE RECALL WAS ANNOUNCED 1/11/17.  AUDI NOTIFIED ME IN MARCH 2017 THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE TO MAKE THE REPAIR.  SINCE THAT TIME, I HAVE NOT RECEIVED ANY FURTHER COMMUNICATION FROM AUDI ON THE REPAIR TIMELINE.  NOW THAT WE ARE IN THE SUMMER MONTHS, I FEEL UNSAFE IN MY VEHICLE.
